metadata.description: This rule detects when API Key is not rotated in production environment
metadata.name: GCP_API_Key_not_rotated
metadata.author: Deloitte

ruleText:
rule GCP_API_Key_not_rotated 
{

  meta:
    name = "GCP_API_Key_not_rotated"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detects when API Key is not rotated in production environment"
    severity = "Medium"

  events:
    $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_SECURITYCENTER_MISCONFIGURATION"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "API_KEY_NOT_ROTATED"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Security Command Center"
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "Google"
    $e.security_result.category_details = "MISCONFIGURATION"
    $e.target.resource.attribute.labels["resource_parentDisplayName"] = "Production"


  condition:
    $e
}
